snippet: The New York City Ballet opened its winter season on Tuesday night with a Balanchine-Tchaikovsky triple bill.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews three Balanchine-Tchaikovsky ballets performed by New York City Ballet during opening concert of company's winter season.
lead_paragraph: The New York City Ballet opened its winter season on Tuesday night with a Balanchine-Tchaikovsky triple bill.

headline.seo: New York City Ballet at the Koch Theater
headline.main: Letting Dance Carry Music: Balanchine Put Tchaikovsky in Perspective
headline.print_headline: Letting Dance Carry Music: Balanchine Put Tchaikovsky in Perspective
